title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
There is a difference of 21460.0 between the maximum State Iowa and minimum State Kansas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Number in thousands in the y axis.
The Number in thousands is appeared to be the highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
There is a difference of 21460.0 between the maximum State Iowa and minimum State Kansas.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
State North Carolina has the second highest value for Number in thousands.
The difference of Number in thousands between the highest and lowest State is 21460.0.
Number in thousands at State Iowa is 23500.0 , second place is North Carolina at 8900.0, and thirdly is Minnesota at 8700.0.
The State Kansas tends to be 3.65 percent lower than average.
The Number in thousands is 64310.0 if we add up values of all States.
